title: Capstone Project - Store Price Calculator
question:
Background information

Store Price Calculator is an application that computes the cost of all the items bought by a customer. The customer is able to select the items from the list that also displays the price of each item. Once the customer is done with selecting the items, the program displays the total amount to be paid by the customer.

Project objective

Using Python develop a simple program to compute the total cost of items purchased by a customer.

Requirements

Here are the milestones you need to achieve to finish this project


Additional Challenge

Modify the Store Price Calculator as suggested below:
◼ Enter the amount paid by the customer and display if any change has to be paid back by the storekeeper.
◼ Create a List of stock and when the user selects an item, check if it is available. Display a message if it is not available
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

 3
